title: Hades
description: Battle your way out of the Underworld in this fast-paced action roguelike, blending intense combat with a rich, evolving story based on Greek mythology.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Build your dream farm, make friends, fall in love, and restore your grandfatherâ€™s legacy in this relaxing and heartfelt farming simulator.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Explore the vast, ruined kingdom of Hallownest in this beautifully hand-drawn Metroidvania adventure filled with secrets and challenging enemies.

title: Undertale
description: An RPG where no one has to die. Your choices truly matter in this quirky, emotional, and subversive adventure filled with unforgettable characters.

title: Dead Cells
description: Fight, die, learn, and repeat in this roguelike Metroidvania featuring fluid combat, tight controls, and ever-changing castle layouts.

title: Cuphead
description: A run-and-gun platformer inspired by 1930s cartoons, featuring hand-drawn visuals, jazzy music, and some of the toughest boss fights in gaming.

title: Celeste
description: Climb a mysterious mountain in this precision platformer about perseverance, mental health, and self-discovery, with challenging yet rewarding gameplay.

title: Into the Breach
description: Command a squad of mechs to defend humanity from alien threats in this tactical, turn-based strategy game where every move counts.

title: Tunic
description: Embark on a mysterious adventure as a small fox in a vast world filled with ancient secrets, clever puzzles, and cryptic symbols.

title: A Hat in Time
description: A cute-as-heck 3D platformer where you play as a tiny space-traveling girl collecting Time Pieces across vibrant, whimsical worlds.

title: Terraria
description: Dig, build, fight, and explore a vast 2D sandbox world full of adventure, crafting, monsters, and endless creativity.
